channel.title: NFoL5 (5/16) - Endgame - BD, Merc, and Strigoi win!
channel.description:
![Throne of Lies Banner|900x275](https://i.imgur.com/cdLeUII.png)
### Welcome to Newbie-friendly FoL 5 - hosted by @Datbird, @Chloe, and @Arete ### Reviewed by the FoL Balance Team
## Rules
Follow the [Global Forum/Discord/Game/Meta Rules](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/global-forum-discord-game-meta-rules-please-read-first/244), and the [Official Forum Game Rules](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/official-forum-mafia-and-forum-of-lies-rules/78926). Please make sure you have enough time for this game before you sign up.
Wisdom of the Mod will be used heavily for this game in order to ensure a quality game experience.
New players to the site will have priority over any experienced player.
Alts are *not* allowed.
## Gameplay
* Days are 48 hours long or until an execution ends it, Nights last 24 hours. The first day is an exception, it lasts only 24 hours and has no execution. * You will be provided a DM with your classcard by the host, send your actions there. * Unseen/Cult will talk through a special Discord server or forum message. * All other private messages will take place through the forum. * Flavor, if it exists, is not alignment-indicative.
## Executions
* To accuse someone say “/vote [player]”. Please make the life of the hosts easier by bolding it, and pinging an active host: `**/vote [player] @host**` and `**/unvote @host**` * Should the votes reach majority, that player will be executed and the day will end. * When the day ends, the player with the most votes will be executed. * Tied votes will result in a player being eliminated at random from among the tied players. * Voting “no execute” is an option. * You may self vote.
## Picking a New King
* At the start of day 2 and every day phase after a king dies, a king election takes place. There will not be an election if there are 4 or less players alive. * When the king dies a 12 hour period starts. In this, players may vote *in their class PM* for who they want to become the next king. * Voting for execution may take place simultaneously. If a majority execution takes place before the end of the 12 hour period, the election instantly resolves. * Whoever receives the most votes in this period will be crowned king. If votes are tied, a king election will be held the next day to determine it.
## Action Results
Ask the hosts if you have any questions. The [feedback list](https://forum.throneoflies.com/t/forum-of-lies-hosting-feedback-list/75082) works for most results.
Night abilities will be processed in following order/priority:
1. Visit Prevention 2. Occupation 4. Bus Driving (target swapping) 5. Killing 6. Protection 7. Miscellaneous Effects (like Bounty) 8. Investigation 1 (Faction checks, type checks, etc) 9. Conversion 10. Investigation 2 (Every kind of investigation which checks for abilities used *this* night)
In case there are conflicts on the same level (example: two drunks bus drive the same people), all these conflicting effects are canceled.
## Journals
DM the host what you want on your journal. When you die, the last update to your journal will be revealed to everyone. It has a limit of 1000 characters.
## Roles: [Classes](https://forum.throneoflies.com/t/new-forum-of-lies-classcards-now-officially-official/87793) **Archer will NOT be used in this setup!** ## Classlist
[color=purple]**Mastermind**[/color] / [color=darkred]**Cult Leader**[/color] [color=purple]**Assassin**[/color] / [color=purple]**Baron**[/color] / [color=darkred]**Random Cult**[/color] [color=steblue]**Prince**[/color] [color=steblue]**Random Blue Dragon**[/color] [color=steblue]**Random Blue Dragon**[/color] [color=steblue]**Random Blue Dragon**[/color] [color=steblue]**Random Blue Dragon**[/color] [color=steblue]**Random Blue Dragon**[/color] [color=steblue]**Random Blue Dragon**[/color] [color=steblue]**Random Blue Dragon**[/color] [color=steblue]**Random Blue Dragon**[/color] [color=steblue]**Random Blue Dragon**[/color] [color=steblue]**Random Blue Dragon**[/color] [color=steblue]**Random Blue Dragon**[/color]**/**[color=grey]**Random Neutral Non-Killer**[/color] [color=grey]**Random Neutral Non-Killer**[/color] [color=turquoise]**Neutral Evil**[/color]
## Playerlist
1. ATNoName 2. ~~Aelin~~ - [color=e83c2d]**Eliminated Day 2**[/color] - [color=#86a94a]**The Mercenary**[/color] 3. EliThePsycho 4. Marluxion :crown: 5. ~~pandagod~~ -> WindwardAway 6. min 7. ~~Silviu200530~~ - - [color=e83c2d]**Modkilled Day 3**[/color] - [color=steblue]**The Paladin**[/color] 8. ~~Yellow~~ - [color=e83c2d]**Eliminated Day 5**[/color] - [color=darkred]**The Devout King**[/color] 9. PokemonKidRyan 10. ~~GreyDragon~~ - [color=e83c2d]**Died Night 2**[/color] - [color=steblue]**The Noble**[/color] 11. Oogway 12. Napoleon 13. ~~BlueLance~~ - [color=e83c2d]**Eliminated Day 4**[/color] - [color=steblue]**The Chronomancer**[/color] 14. ~~katze~~ [color=e83c2d]**Died Night 4**[/color] - [color=steblue]**The Prince**[/color] 15. ~~Marshal~~ - [color=e83c2d]**Died Night 3**[/color] - [color=darkred]**The Ritualist**[/color] 16. ~~Appelsiini~~ - [color=e83c2d]**Died Night 2**[/color] - [color=steblue]**The Squire**[/color]
## Backups 1. CRichard564 2. Tangeld 3. Nightingale
## Threadmarks [**Day 2 Start**](https://forum.throneoflies.com/t/nfol5-16-16-night-1/87813/551?u=chloe) - Nobody died! [**Day 2 King Election**](https://forum.throneoflies.com/t/nfol5-16-16-day-2/87813/1030?u=chloe) - All hail King Yellow! [**Day 2 End**](https://forum.throneoflies.com/t/nfol5-15-16-night-2-aelin-bites-the-dust/87813/2786?u=chloe) - Aelin is eliminated!
[**Day 3 Start**](https://forum.throneoflies.com/t/nfol5-13-16-day-3/87813/2789?u=chloe) - GreyDragon and Appelsiini have died! [**Day 3 End**](https://forum.throneoflies.com/t/nfol5-12-16-night-3/87813/3966?u=chloe) - Silviu was modkilled
[**Day 4 Start**](https://forum.throneoflies.com/t/nfol5-12-16-day-4/87813/3969?u=chloe) - Marshal has died! [**Day 4 End**](https://forum.throneoflies.com/t/nfol5-10-16-night-4/87813/5251?u=chloe) - BlueLance is eliminated!
[**Day 5 Start**](https://forum.throneoflies.com/t/nfol5-8-16-night-5/87813/5254?u=chloe) - katze has died! [**Day 5 End**](https://forum.throneoflies.com/t/nfol5-8-16-night-5/87813/5387?u=chloe) - Yellow is eliminated!
[**Day 6 Start**](https://forum.throneoflies.com/t/nfol5-7-16-day-6-all-hail-king-marluxion/87813/5389?u=chloe) - Oogway has died! [**Day 6 King Election**](https://forum.throneoflies.com/t/nfol5-7-16-day-6-all-hail-king-marluxion/87813/5502?u=chloe) - All hail King Marluxion!

i just so happened to rand the a role that made me exaggerate it a bit more than intended

item.dc:creator: WindwardAway
item.description:
That’s a good point actually
I was completely willing to believe the prince claim because the princess claim read as completely fake to me, but there wasnt any agenda coming from them. But I thought because kat was so certain that Marshal was town, that something was off, but it just turned out to be that katze’s read on Marshal was wrong

Like, people knew he was holding onto to some info (Him being prince with that fake ass princess check lmao)

but his behaviour and tone didnt feel very wolfy or agenda-y to me tbh.

didnt matter in hindsight but i was basically clearing PKR overnight
